sourceMeaningMnemonic: You'll work your <radical>soul</radical> to <radical>death</radical> if you're too <kanji>busy</kanji>. Being busy just isn't good for your soul. Take breaks. Go on vacation. Don't be so busy that you destroy yourself.
meaningInfo: Look around you. See all those busy people? Their souls are dying. Don't end up like them.
readingMnemonic: Take time out of your <kanji>busy</kanji> life and go <reading>bow</reading>ling (<ja>ぼう</ja>) once in a while. In fact, you should probably go bowling once a week at least. Nothing brings energy back to your life like some relaxing bowling.
readingInfo: Think about your busy schedule this week. Now cancel everything and just go bowling instead.
